author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Title says it all, part of the migrations in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/31061 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36404. in partial response of [this spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/18hTA-VwyNAQcclQM-vgXFJRqxPegDLJC4sZqAQAAuAk/edit#gid=0). 

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: remove more `CMSDEPRECATED_X` warnings in the AlCa/DB area
